name: Anthemic Aggressor
description:
This is a simple three-level metroidvania based on the song Anthemic Aggressor.

SUMMARY - 

You are an old warrior, who has been gifted incredible speed but at a cost; your body is poisoned, and you will soon die.
Luckily, you can temporarily prevent your demise by slaying your enemies, and hopefully you can survive your journey to
find the cure...

CONTROLS -

Dash (Can be done twice in air and goes through enemies) : F

Jump (Double Jump, Off Walls, etc) : Space

Pause : Escape

A and D or the Arrow Keys to move left and right

Hold A or D when against a wall in the air to slide against the wall and hop up it

Left Click or E : Attack

KNOWN BUGS - 

The player is still controllable and the health bar is still seen when going back to the title menu from the game.

Bombs phase through walls

Slimes behave weirdly

Hopefully I'll get around to fixing those.

SPECIAL THANKS - 

A special thanks to John Dywer of Osees for inspiring me to make this game (I really hope this isn't infringement). 
Also huge thanks to Sam and O_Lobster for making these assets, go check these guys out!
